title: Introducing Compiler
description: From the creators of Command Line Heroes, our new original show unravels tech topics both big and bizarre. Join hosts Angela Andrews and Brent Simoneaux as they discuss the things that move technology forward, today and beyond. Compiler premieres August 2021. Find out more at redhat.com/en/compiler-podcast.
author: info@pacific-content.com (Red Hat)
